1553322221121112221.content:
It was another all out cheer leading practice weekend. Spring break had just started and starting Monday, the team would be on a non stop cheer leading competition tour. To say this Friday was "crunch time," would be a bit of an understatement.

As always, Ron was on the bleachers cheering the team on in his usual dorkish manner. Most of them had zoned him out to some degree. They're focus was more on Kim. The captain was keeping them busy with practice upon practice upon practice. Fortunately, she kept their spirits up. Well... most of their spirits up. Bonnie was being her usual aggravated self, complaining every so often about the practice routine. No one was biting though; this event was too important and from the others perspective, Bonnie was just looking for an opportunity to challenge Kim. If they weren't practicing as hard, Bonnie probably would've spoken up and complained about the opposite.

After about 5-6 solid hours of this, all of the girls were exhausted and ready to turn it in. The time was about 9:45ish. KP thanked Ron for staying the entire time for moral support, eliciting nods of agreement.

All seemed fine for the most part, they were on track for the competition. KP tried to keep the others spirits high as they walked into the locker room "Good work out there girls. At this rate, we should be great for the Monday competition."

Kim got some smiles and "thanks" responses, but the overall atmosphere was down. Kim sighed. She didn't blame them, this was an exhausting experience. She thought to herself though that they'd probably be in better shape if not for Bonnie. But that was sorta out of control, she couldn't talk to Bonnie about it. That'd only make a scene and drag the atmosphere down further. Hopefully tomorrow she'd talk it over with Bonnie and private and try to prevent the same mishap again.

Shortly after Kim spoke up, she opened her own locker, like the others, and something shot straight into her neck. It didn't make a sound. It didn't even make a bruise. Kim's anxiety shot up at the mark. She knew whatever it was, it wasn't good. Internally, she chided herself for being so out of the zone.

Right as thoughts of regret came to her mind, she felt ting-ly all over as if her body was going through a sudden and rapid growth spurt, but in the opposite direction. KP softly touched her tummy, trying to keep the pain to herself. Fortunately, nobody noticed. KP's worry skyrocketed though. So, she, acting as normally as she could, made a b-line for the bathroom.

What was this? Something was off? Did Draken have something planted inside her locker? Augh, why of all places and times. He was getting smarter, hitting her while she was down. She'd be sure to harass Shego about this the next time she saw her.

As she got into the bathroom stool, the first signs of change occurred. KP was slowly regressing and a thought hit her mind "Would she really be able to see Shego again?" Her dignity was in shambles. She couldn't bear to think about Ron's disappointment. She wasn't thinking rationally. Ron would never do that.

These thoughts reverberated around in her head until she was at the ripe age of 10. Her focus on disappointment shifted quite drastically to embarrassment and teasing. Everyone would be so mean! Little did KP realize that her cheerleader outfit was a bit too big on her, several sizes in fact. Her legs were now much farther from the floor. Being on the toilet with the seat down was like sitting on a stool at this point.

These thoughts of embarrassment and teasing continued for several ages downward, becoming all the more haunting with each second. By age 7, tears quietly formed on around her eyes. At age 6, her face was a quiet flood of tears. By age 4, the thoughts changed one last time to being "babied." At this age, her cheer leader uniform which once covered a portion of her, engulfed her. Her top extended all the way down to her legs, which now didn't hang at all from the toilet seat. Her bra, panties, and skirt remained loose articles of clothing covered by the top.

These babying fears manifested into a quiet sobbing at age 3, being faintly heard from the locker area. All of the cheerleaders were still there, albeit only some could hear. Tara spoke up first "What's that sound?"

Bonnie rolled her eyes. "What sound? What are you talking about?"

Tara sulked. "You seriously can't hear that? Get a hearing aid."

Bonnie snipped back. "Well, if it's that easy to hear. Where's it coming from?"

"I dunno, it's a little too quiet to make out. I feel like someone needs my help."

Bonnie facepalmed. "The exhaustion is getting to your head."

Shortly after Bonnie said that, Kim hit age 2 and her sobs became more audible Now all of the cheerleaders could hear something to some degree. "Wait what is that?"

Tara perked up. "So, now you believe me?"

Before Bonnie could cut in, Liz asked "Hmm.. come to think of it. Where is Kim?"

Crystal responded "Hmm, I think I saw her going to the bathroom a couple minutes ago."

Bonnie raised her voice a little. "Forget about Kim, where's that noise coming from?"

Hope answered "Um.. the bathroom I think?"

Shortly after Hope made that comment, Kim hit the ripe age of 1 and the sobs morphed into a wail. "WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHH!!"

That noise rung strongly throughout all of the cheerleaders heads. Concern quickly overwhelmed many of them. They were all well versed in babysitting to some degree that the sound of a baby wailing was impossible to miss.

They all ran to the bathroom, some still in their cheer leading outfit and others in their casual clothes.

Very easily they all discerned that it was coming through the far stool. The thought didn't cross any of their heads. What was a baby doing in here? Didn't KP have a habit of going in the far stool?

Bonnie tried opening the door, but it was locked shut. In Bonnie's urge to get to the baby, she started jerking the door back and forth only making little Kimmy more scared.

There was a collective "Stop Bonnie!" quickly into Bonnie's door jerking.

Tara then got an idea and slid from underneath the door. Only someone as adaptable as her would've done something like that so fast.

When Tara got to the other side, she took one look at the baby and concern immediately hit her. Wa-was that KIM?

What happens now?
1553322221121112221.title: We Can't be Led by a Baby Captain!

choices: Tara's since she's so good at understanding Kim
Someone else. Tara may not be the best choice
15533222211211122211.content:
Tara trembled at the thought of this being Kim, but something in her could not bear to see this baby, whoever it was, wail so much. When Tara had come through the stall, the baby had only glanced at her for a second before continuing to wail. Naturally, this put forth a challenge for the energetic cheer leader.

In a single motion, she scooped the baby up in the little bundle of cheerleading clothes and rocked her gently back and forth. Before Tara knew it, the baby calmed down. "There there, it's okay. We wo-"

Bonnie cut her off. "Is everything alright in there?"

Tara looked deadpanned. "Yes, everything's fine."

"Well then come out will ya."

The other cheer leaders gave affirmative "yeah, come on Tara" after Bonnie's statement.

Tara looked down at the little one in her arms before and rolled her eyes with a smirk. Her fellow cheerleaders really were curious to see this adorable little bundle, now weren't they.

With a soft smile, Tara opens the bathroom stall door and a whole hosts of eyes hover over the little one. Little Kimmy hides her face, hearing nothing but "d'awwws" over her cuteness. This was so embarrassing, but also oddly comforting.



Bonnie is the one to unintentionally break up the d'awwws. "Awwww, she's so cute. Where'd you come from you little bundle of joy?"

Tara gently speaks up. "Uh, I don't know, but something tells me it's Kim."

All the cheerleaders then look up at Tara in confusion and annoyance. What is she talking about? This-this adorable baby is Kim. This had to just be typical Tara and her zanny ideas again.

Bonnie asks genuinely "What makes you think that?"

"I dunno. It's just a feeling that I can't really-"

Tara cuts herself off after something falls from the bundle of clothes. It was Kim's communicator.

All the girls stared at the communicator in dumbfounded horror and then back at the baby.

There was a brief pause of silence as all the teens, including Tara, tried your wrap their minds over this.

Bonnie worked up the nerve to ask as gently as she could. "K-kim is that you?" This was a rare moment of kindness from Bonnie to Kim, something which was only reserved for the most bizarre of circumstances.

KP froze with fear at the question. She shortly turned her head and nodded, only to seconds later cover her face again in Tara's chest.

Normally, this reaction would garner "d'awwwws." Given the unique circumstances, it only made the cheer leaders more concerned. Their quiet fear was evident.

Tara worked up the nerve next. "Kim, how'd this happen?"

Kim briefly turned her head to say "wa-ka" and covered her shame once more.

Tara sounded out the word. "Wa-ka.. walker? oh wait, Locker?"

Kim just "uh huh"-ed her response.

Tara took a deep breath and rocked Kim back and forth. "It'll be alright Kim. One sec and we'll find out what you're talking about."

Tara held Kim comfortably in her arms as she led the girls to Kim's locker.

As they approached the locker, Tara looked inside. She found a note.

Enjoy the diaper changes Kimmy.
That dart was specially made.
Enjoy your new youth.
-Shego

Tara gulped from stress after reading the note, passing it to others. A series of gasps spread throughout the group.

Kimmy peaked out from Tara's chest and could see all the girls disappointed faces. Something snapped in her. She wanted to cheer them up. She couldn't stand to see her team so upset, especially if they were sorry for her.

Kimmy tucked back the nerves and clapped her hands trying to get their attention. Within seconds, all of her teammates looked up at her. Kim tried her best to pronounce the word hoping to give off the idea. "Ca-moo-na-ca-ta."

Tara spelled out the words again. "Wait.. Kim, you said ca-moo-na-ca-ta? Camun-a-cata. Um, do you mean communicator?"

Kim blushed and nodded. Liz picked up the communicator. "I think there's some person on here that Kim, uses for tech info right?"

Crystal spoke up. "Yeah, I remember Kim talking to some guy named Wad or like Wade I think."

Liz flipped to the contacts. "Hmm.. wait, Wade? That name's here. I'll call it."

After a couple seconds of dialing, Wade picked up "Hey Kim, everything alr-"

He saw a whole host of girls at the screen. "Um, mind telling me why all of you are calling me on Kim's communicator."

All of them spoke at once, making it nearly impossible to understand what was going on. Wade could only catch a couple words. The word "baby" seemed to come up quite a bit.

Bonnie sulked. "Okay, all of you be quiet. I'll tell him."

Wade just responded matter-of-factly to her assertive-ness. "K. I'm listening."

"K, so um dweeb, Kim's locker was booby trapped by this person named Shego and now she's a baby." Bonnie turned the communicator to face Kim, who timidly waved to Wade.

"We contacted you, because we've got like no other options. Please tell us you can fix this."

Wade looked kind of dumbfounded. "Wow.. that's a lot to take in."

Bonnie seemed concerned "We know, so can you do anything about it?"

Wade smiled. "Well, this has gotta be one of the biggest challenges I've seen, but I'm up for a challenge."

All the girls enthusiastically said "Yes!"

"However.. it's gonna take some time."

Bonnie asked in agitated tone "How much time?"

Wade nervously chuckled. "Maybe like a month?"

"A month?!"

"Okay okay, maybe that was a little too long."

"Yea, ya think?"

Wade took a deep breath. "Okay, I'll try my best to have it done in a week."

Bonnie snarly retorted "A week?"

"What do you expect out of me? It's not every night you hear you need to change your friend from a baby back to her regular age."

Bonnie and the other dejectedly responded. "K.. fair enough."

Wade's eye brows raised. "If you don't mind me asking, is there any big reason you want this done so fast other than the obvious."

Bonnie answered. "Well, shyeah. She's kind of our cheer leading captain and we have a round of competitions coming up this week. It's not like we can say, hey sorry, but our captain turned into a baby, so we'll have to forfeit."

This statement upset Kimmy to a degree, causing her to tuck her face in Tara again. Tara glared at Bonnie.

Bonnie sighed. "Augh, sorry for snapping. Thank you anyway."

Wade spoke up before they signed out. "Wow, wow, wow. Hold on a sec. You don't have to forfeit."

"What are you getting at?"

"You all can make a new routine centered around well Kim's baby-ness and get points for creativity."

This statement brought about a round of excitement from the other girls. Bonnie cut in though with pessimism "Um, do you have any idea how hard it is to come up with a new routine."

Wade sighed. "It was just a suggestion. Look. I'll get back to you all as soon as possible. Best of luck with this whole problem." The communicator then hung up.

Bonnie sighed. "This is a disast-"

Kimmy cut her off with "smiles and cheerful clapping," bringing an upbeat energy to all of them, including Bonnie (who cut herself off to go "d'awwwww")

This might have just been a blessing in disguise for them. Kim's cheer power was now on a whole knew level, big enough to make even the likes of Bonnie smile. Forming a new routine could be hard, not to mention embarrassing, but it could work out.

Then one of her peers, Marcella, asked a question that cut deep. "I'm all for this idea as much as the others, but how are we going to make this all work?'

Jessica spoke up with curiosity. "What do you mean? I think the seven of us can handle one baby. We all know how to change diapers, right?"

The question made Kim blush adorably. All this positivity caused by her made her forget those obvious unpleasant details. All of the teenagers nodded.

Marcella spoke up again. "No, I mean, how are we going to get Kim's parents to agree to this."

Hope optimistically interjected. "Well, that doesn't sound too hard. With a little assistance from Ron and maybe you Marcella, since you're so good with words, we'd convince them. They have to know that Kim gets into trouble like this."

Marcella smiled. "Good point."

Bonnie nodded. "Okay then, looks like that's a wrap. We're all good no-"

Bonnie cut herself off upon hearing what sounded like pee, coming from KP. Tara nervously spoke up "Hehe, is there any baby supplies in Kim's locker? The little one just had an accident."

Kim sighed and blushed. Dis was gonna be hard to get used to.

Who's house does Kim stay at
15533222211211122211.title: Baby or Not, We're Not a Team without Kimmy!

choices: The girls calm Ron down before a scene is made
Ron cannot be calmed down and a scene commences
155332222112111222111.content:
Upon hearing Kim's gross peeing and Tara breaking the news, all of the cheerleaders made "ew" comments to some degree. Tara seemed completely traumatized more so than any other girl as Kim had pee-ed on her in her own arms.

Bonnie snapped out of earlier though, facepalming. A couple seconds of continued "ews" later and Bonnie spoke up. "Augh, look, all of you just be quiet. Yeah, it's gross, but honestly what did we expect. Kim is a baby after all."

The word "baby" really brought a damper onto everyone else's mood, especially Kim, who covered her eyes with shame. Instead of the usual glares, the atmosphere remained down in the dumps.

Bonnie took a deep breath. This wasn't normal. Beyond the obvious details of Kim being a literal baby, Bonnie's negativity usually didn't cut through so effectively. In rare scene of sympathy from Bonnie to Kim, she tucked in her pride.

She could try lifting the mood up with some talk, but she knew no one would buy it. Actions always spoke louder than words when it came to her. So, she got into action.

In a seemless action, Bonnie turned to Kim's gym locker and pulled out the duffle bag that the villain probably left. She rummaged through it, hoping for sheer life that some baby supplies were in it.

"Wa la!" Diapers, powder, wipes. The bag had it all.

Bonnie's energetic "Wa la" attracted embarrassing notice as everyone, even Kim looked at her in shock.

Bonnie sighed, tucking in her pride a second time. She was about to do the unspeakable, apply a diaper to her rival Kim. She nervously chuckled. "Hey Kim, one second, let's get you cleaned up."

Kim paused with anxiety to suddenly form a grip. "No."

That word everyone understood.

Bonnie tried to reason with Kim. "Look Kim-"

"No."

"Kim, come on, you-"

"No."

"Augh, Kim please don't make this-"

"No."

With the exception of Tara, the other cheerleaders couldn't help but giggle at the scene. Bonnie's frustration was rising and she just cut straight to the actions. She laid down a mat on the locker room bench and firmly but gently took Kim out of Tara's arms.

Tara herself was still phased out of it and somewhat snapped back into reality with Bonnie taking Kim. She just looked in confusion and wonder as Bonnie did something gentle. Geese, did she really have it in her?

Kim was fighting the whole way through. She may have peed herself, but she was not, NOT, going to have Bonnie of all people change her. Kim continued to say "No" furiously, kicking and flailing her arms around.

That's when Bonnie spotted her blessing, a green pacifier in the duffle bag.

Kim didn't noticed this and continued to say "No," thinking that maybe she had won the battle of wills. "No-"

Pluck

Scratch that, Bonnie was still on it. The pacifier shut Kim up, but she continued her flail her arms and kick her legs. The fight was still on.

While frustrated, Bonnie continued on, resorting to nuclear options. She gave Kim a raspberry to the tummy, causing the little one to laugh uncontrollably and pee even more into her panties.

Bonnie quickly stopped, waiting for Kim to calm down. In Kim's small daze, coming back from her laughter state, Bonnie struck and stripped her naked. Kims wet belongings were put on the side of bench. There was a bit of "ew" reactions from the crowd from this. Bonnie continued.

Kim blushed profusely at this, hiding her face and shame from Bonnie. It was over she lost. Bonnie might as well make fun of her for the rest of her li-

"Where'd Kimmy go?" Bonnie asked enthusiastically.

Kim was surprised. Wait, what was Bonnie doing?

Bonnie continued "Ah, come on Kimmy? Where'd you go? Don't you wanna play?"

Where was she? Wanted to play? KIm frowned on the end of her puny hands. There was no way that Bonnie didn't know where Kim was or that Kim wanted play.

Bonnie put some emotion into it. "Kimmy? Please I beg of you where'd you go. I miss you. I'll give you a cookie later if you just come out!"

Cookie? Something in Kim snapped and baby instincts forced their way out. Bonnie couldn't see her. She wanted to play. Kim wanted to play too. She'd Kim a cookie if she came out. Kim wanted cookie!

Kim enthusiastically showed herself to Bonnie with a smile, surprising just about every other cheerleader. Bonnie's technique worked.

"Awww, there's my Kimmy. Well Kimmy, would you mind if I gave you quick changing?"

Kim's smile quickly faded and she crossed her chubby arms in defiance. She was breaking. She didn't say "no" this time.

"Good girl. Babysitter Bonnie promises it'll go by quickly."

Kim humored Bonnie's efforts and said "Kay" reluctantly.

Bonnie jumped into action, not giving Kim a second to reconsider. Milliseconds after Kim said "Kay," her legs and behind were being lifted up for the world to see. Kim hid her face again, hiding her blushes.

"It's okay Kimmy, no one is judging you."

Those words oddly calmed Kim down a little and she revealed a little of her face, by peeking between her fingers.

Kim saw the next step. Bonnie wiped down her butt with a baby wipe, leading to a cold wet feeling for Kimmy. Kim didn't like. She wanted warmth and fast. Bonnie came to the rescue, tapping a comfy amount of baby powder all over.

Kim was surprised. Babysitter Bonnie, no, just Bonnie really knew how to change a diaper.

As Kim marveled at this fact, Bonnie slid one of the comfortable looking pure white diapers underneath. Kim prepared for the lowering of her behind with suspense.

Then it happened. It wasn't so bad actually.

Fold. Fold. Strap.

"There. All done Kimmy, thank you for cooperating so much. You made Babysitter Bonnie proud."

Kim looked away, but smiled, eliciting a round of "awwws" from the crowd. Bonnie was good. Too good. She not only one the battle of wills, but applied Kim's diaper in such a way that Kim enjoyed it. The thought was truly scary. Those baby instincts could come on at any time and she'd lose it.

As Kim pondered and suckled unknowingly on her green pacifier, she made quite the adorable pose and elicited another round of "awws." She wasn't paying attention this time though.

Bonnie interrupted Kim's focus, pulling a light green baby t-shirt over Kim's head and into place. The baby t-shirt resembled Kim's light green regular shirt.

Kim smiled at Bonnie and then quickly stopped once Bonnie noticed it. The two had found that they enjoyed these diaper changes, but neither one wanted to admit it.

Still, Bonnie couldn't help but pick Kim up. Babying her rival had a fun-ness to it, like Bonnie had won against Kim but in way that it could be passed off.

The other girls giggled at the scene there, especially Tara. She found the kindness between the two to be refreshing and just had to comment on it. "Awww, you two are getting along for once?"

Bonnie scowled, raising her eyebrow. "What?"

"Come on Bonnie, admit it, you and Kim are bonding."

Bonnie denied that statement like no other "Ew, gross no. I just think she's a little cute is all."

This elicited more awwwws. Bonnie and Kim blushed. "What can I say? She's adorable."

Kim giggled at Bonnie. Her cuteness really was a force to be reckoned with. The thought that she broke Bonnie's stone cold harsh demeanor was laughable.

Bonnie just smirked. Kim had no reason to giggle, she won the battle and changed Kim's diaper!

Wait what? That thought resonated again. She won the battle and changed Kim's diaper. Why was she cheering about that?!

The cuteness was clearly wearing off. Tara took the cue and scooped the little cheerleader captain up. "Kimmy, I think Bonnie needs a break from your cuteness."

The girls giggled and Bonnie brushed it off. Whatever. So, something came over her, it was no big deal.

Marcella jumped in asked as they were calming down from their laughter. "So.. um, who's house should Kim stay at?"

Tara quickly perked up at the question. "Ooo! Ooo! My house. My house."

Jessica spoke up. "Are you sure, you seemed a little phased out back there."

Tara smiled, trying to brush off that fact. "Eh, we all did, except Bonnie."

Jessica followed the logic. "Soo.. Bonnie should look after her."

Bonnie became wide eyed at the prospect and quickly but gently cut in. "No, no. There's no need of that. I-I'm sure that Tara can handle Kimmy."

"Awww, thanks Bonnie." Tara was touched.

Bonnie quietly responded. "Don't mention it."

"Well, it doesn't just have to be me and Kimmy. We can all do a sleep over!"

The prospect seemed attractive to all of them. Bonnie tried to back out, but 7 pout-y adorable faces convinced her to cave.

All seemed to be fine now that Kim's accident was cleaned up.

Then the door cracks open.

"You girls okay? It's been like I dunno 40 minutes. Isn't that long even for you all?"

Ron opened the door further to see them all crowding around a red headed infant. Wait.. red headed infant...

Ron blurted out with concern. "Is that KIM?!"

The girls took a deep breath. Why couldn't Kim's boy friend, best friend, whatever his relation, why couldn't he be less reactionary?

Kim hides her face in fear.

What now?
155332222112111222111.title: Taking Care of Kimmy, You Need the Right Touch

choices: Time Skip to Staying At Tara's house
Continue on right where we're leaving off here
1553322221121112221111.content:
Immediately following the cheerleaders' sigh, Ron ran up wide eyed to the now red headed green pacifier suckling infant. Pretty quickly, Ron took a clue that this was in fact Kim and that he probably wasn't making things any easier for her.

Ron tried to play it cool. It's okay. No problem. Kim's a baby. No big deal. You got this Stoppable. You got this-

Light-headed-ness interrupted Ron causing him to almost black out from shock. Fortunately, one of the cheer leaders, Hope, caught him and the rest got him back on his feet.

Bonnie cut into Ron with an insensitive remark "Get it together Dork."

As insensitive as Bonnie's words were, they reassured Ron that this was in fact still reality. "K, Bonnie's a jerk. I'm not dreaming."

Bonnie clenched her teeth. Ugh, where'd that loser get the confidence to call her something like that in front of her face.

Before Bonnie lashed at him, the other cheerleaders reminded her to cut it out. Marcella interjected "We need his help remember Bonnie?"

Bonnie sighed. "Yeah, I remember. Whatever." She'd get him back for that comment when all of this was over.

Ron raised his eye brow at the mention of "help." "Help with wha-?"

He cut himself off upon seeing Kim again. Oh yeah, that was going on. The jerkness of Bonnie gave him a bit of breather from the real disaster.

Tara spoke up seeing that he was stressing out again. She walked up to him with his baby best friend in toe. "Ron, relax. We got this under control. You're stressing her out."

Right then, Kim peaked between her fingers, only to cover back up. This gave Ron a healthy dose of perspective. People always underestimated Ron's ability to be sensitive to others. He wasn't as much of a reactionary maniac as some on the cheer-leading squad thought of him as. "Kay.. ya got me. I ju-just gotta ask, how'd this all happen?"

Bonnie cut straight to the point. "Kim opened her locker, got hit by something, like a dark or something, by this person named Shego and now is a baby."

"Did you contact Wa-?"

"Wade, yea dork, we contacted him. He said it'd be another week until he finds a cure."

Ron brainstormed for a sec, before realizing Kim's outfit. "And who applied a dia-"

"Ut ut ut, that's not important right now." Bonnie was quick to cut Ron's question off right there.

Ron was a little confused. "Huh?"

A couple of the others whispered into his ear what happened, causing him to go "OOooo.. I see..."

"Then you came in and that's about it." Tara finished.

Ron took a deep breath himself. "So, Kim, how's it um going?"

Kim perked up the will to show her face, her very red with embarrassment face. She timidly waved her hand, before immediately clutching Tara's chest again.

Ron was concerned. Augh, what to do, what to do...? This was Kim. This was a baby though. How could he cheer her up. After a couple seconds of brainstorming, he got it. He gave Rufus a signal and began his plan, "Cheer Baby Kim up."

"It's cool Kim. Ya know, this reminds me off-" He cut himself off as the broom Rufus but there caused him to lose his balance and fall.

Before any one could get a word in, Kim started giggling. Ron's plan worked. A little harmless clumsiness always cheered her up and Ron knew these nitty gritty facets of Kim's personality better than just about anyone else. The only people who also knew them to a equal degree probably were Kim's parents.

As Kim was laughing, Ron got up and scooped her up. "It's cool Kim. Ron Stoppable rolls with the punches."

Kim smiled upon hearing that and said "Ta-Ta-ta.. Won"

Ron smiled back, trying to seem all cool. "No problemo Kim."

The rest of the cheerleaders, with maybe the exception of Bonnie, found this adorable. They also found it another strong indication of Ron and Kim's strong chemistry. Maaaaybe Ron would be some to have around.

What's next?

PB didn't answer. She was too focused on the machine, panicking to solve the problem. Before she knew it though she heard wails. She turned around to see a 1 year old Marceline that was quickly losing years. Right then PB did the only thing she could think to do, she smashed the machine, canceling off any further effects.

But it was too late, the machine had already done it's worst. Marceline cried at the top of her lungs upon seeing the gadget broken. "WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!!!"

PB nearly teared up, becoming tear-y eyed at seeing what she did to her friend. In a quick almost stream less fashion, she did the only thing she could think to do, she picked up Baby Marceline (or Marcy, now that she was a baby) and her bundle of clothes and rocked her back and forth. PB tapped into all her skills as a leader to calm her friend. She was skilled at saying and acting just in the way too sooth her people after all. That finally broke Marceline out of her tears and she simply folded her chubby arms and scowled at PB.

PB knew what Marceline was telling her from that expression. "What? I couldn't just let you cry like that and I had to get through to you."

Marceline spoke up in a high pitched voice "Wew.. me not baby. No you tweat me wike baby, ya got it."

PB's belittling normally would result in rage from Marceline, but this time it broke her. Marceline just slowly started to tear up. She didn't know how to respond. What a poor little thing.

PB started to rock her back and forth, trying to be as comforting as possible to such a baby, which meant treating Marceline more like a baby. "Don't cry my little one. This is mommy's fault if anything."

"Yes, it was my fault putting you in these clothes to begin with. They remind me of an old friend and I put them on you, not thinking about your feelings."

This only teared Marceline up further. PB knew this was a little much, but she didn't think it was right to tell any baby in this agitated state that they were really a grown up. She merely soothed Little Marcy by humming quietly. She then knocked on her door to which a servant came in.

PB was rather quick. "Please get me some baby materials stat!!" The servant said "OK Princess" and ran quickly to the closest store.

In the mean time, PB sang to her little baby. "Hush my little baby don't you cry, Mommy's gonna help you by, She will protect you through thick and thin, All you have to do is stay within, Her arms will cuddle you all day long, and while she does she'll sing this soooong."

PB sang this song a couple times, before the servant came back. By which point, Little Marcy was drowsy in her "mommy's" arms.

PB quickly said "thank you," closed the door and gently laid Little Marcy on the floor, preparing for the diaper changing. PB took a quick breathe. This was not how she thought she'd spend her night, but she was trying to make the most of it.

Very gently, PB removed Little Marcy's grown up clothes and pampered the baby's butt, trying not to wake her up any further. If anything, Marcy being in this drowsy state was the best thing. Once the powdering was complete, PB carefully raised her former friends legs, sliding a soft cotton candy like diaper underneath and strapping everything into place.

To keep the little bumpkin warm, PB also put a cozy darker pink baby shirt over Little Marcy, followed by an adorable light pair of pink socks.

With more time on her hands, she opened up a secret door in her room. The door led to another secret room for guests who weren't to be harmed.

PB started setting up a baby room while Little Marcy slept. Just about everything was set up, the crib, the baby dresser, a baby mini fridge, the changing table, and baby book shelf. The only thing was remaining was what would be Little Marcy's toy box. PB was putting in the last toy, when Little Marcy woke up.

PB kept up the act, greeting her former friend again as though she was her mommy. "Hi there sleepy head, how did my little sugar snap sleep huh?"

Little Marcy yawned and said in an adorably high pitched voice "bad, me dwempt dat me turn inta PBeee's baybe-" Little Marcy finally noticed her voice and opened her eyes to see her friend looming over her.

PB quickly comforted her "Awww, it's okay. You wanna cuddle with your stuffed bear?" PB decided that she just wouldn't act normal in front of Marceline until things were back to normal. PB wasn't comfortable with her friend knowing the truth and becoming scared. The device probably would take another month or so to make and even then, her chances of getting the right tools were slim. PB held up a little white stuffed bear to Little Marcy's face, but Little Marcy hit it away and said "Come ooona PBee, dis is wa-dika-wose. Me gwow nup. Jus tell me how wong me gonna hab ta stay wike dis."

PB took the baby out of the harness, again cuddling her. "I don't know what you mean my Little Marcy? You must've had one crazy dream. You were a grown up in this dream?"

Marceline started to doubt her very identity "Ye-yea, me wa weawy ol-da an-an you wa me nerdy fwend,"

PB was a little annoyed that's how she was remember, but she kept her cool. "Haha, what a dream that was! Was it fun? Was playing with mommy as a grown up the best?"

Marceline was even more confused now. "Wew.. naa-not weawy. Sometime it fun, oda time na so much."

"Well then that's how you know it was a dream, right? You love playing with mommy now don't you." PB then tickled Little Marcy's tummy.

Marceline was trying to resist this new reality, but.. hormones were coming out inside her, making PB actually seem like a warm cuddly mommy. This picture and the picture in her head were totally different and as she was thinking hard on it, the other mental picture drifted away. Her memory basically went to the back of her memory storage and not long after she accepted this new life as though it had always been that way. Marceline now saw herself as "Little Marcy, believing whatever her mommy told her.

Little Marcy now spoke up "Haha, you wight mommy. Me sowwy ta insult you. Wha shud we do now?"

PB said..

155332222222222222222222222222211121.content:
It was an unusual weekend for Star Butterfly. Marco had left for the weekend the other night and they had this Friday off. So, starting this Friday morning, Star lounged around in her room, wondering who to hang out with.

She enjoyed traveling to other dimensions, but it just wouldn't be the same without Marco. So, she scrolled through her list of human friends that she happened to have. One section in particular spoke out to her. It read "cheerleader friends."

She quickly said to herself after seeing that area "Oooo.. those girls are just the kinda people I need to cheer me up! Let's see.. who might be available?" and scrolled through a list of names. Star jokingly asked herself "Hmm.. who wouldn't be busy on a Friday Friday F-Fa-Friday" and then spotted the perfect one, "Sabrina."

As Star could remember, Sabrina was the nervous cheer leader with auburn hair. One might think someone so nervous wouldn't be cheerful at all, but Star Butterfly saw that attribute as merely a reason for Sabrina being lonely. So, in the flash of a second, she poofed herself right outside Sabrina's house. Luckily for Sabrina, Star was only knocking at 10:10 in the morning. It wasn't some abnormally early time.

After Star knocked on Sabrina's house door, several minutes passed before someone was finally at the door. It happened to be Sabrina herself in a light green and white night gown with her hair hardly combed, wearing comfy white slippers. She saw from her window that it was Star and tried best she could to contain her grogginess and nerves.

In a somewhat concerned exhausted voice, Sabrina asked "Star.. what brings you here this early in the morning?"

Star laughed "This early. It's nearly 10 o'clock! I'm always up by this hour."

That suddenly made Sabrina freak "wait, is school still on today?!"

Star cracked up a little more "Nnnope, it's still off. So, I've got nothing to do and I figured you might wanna hang out!"

After Star said that, she could tell Sabrina was touched and also nervous. Sabrina asked back "But what about Marco?"

Star was a little glum with her response. "He's away on the weekend" followed by a quick perky "but you're still in town, so I'm great."

Sabrina blushed a little. "Well, come in then, it's hot out."

After Sabrina let in Star and closed the door, Star joyfully asked "Sooooo.. whatcha wanna do first?!"

Sabrina was tempted to tell Star to be quiet, but Sabrina was too scared to. Her parents were already up and out, so she had no reason to give. (Not that Star would really lower her voice either way)

Sabrina just answered with an "um.. I-I don't know. I just woke up and was gonna go threw the shower before you came."

Star smiled "Pfff.. why would you take a shower?"

Sabrina was somewhat concerned by that question and what it possibly meant. She frighteningly answered "Uh, to get clean..."

Star perked up "Oh no need there. I can clean you up with my magic."

Sabrina tried to say as gently as she could "I-I'm good. I'm a little concerned about your magic, seeing what you do to Marco. Um, sorry..."

Star took that as a competitive challenge. "Oh yea.. well, how about I show you it works fine, cleaning myself!"

Sabrina didn't know how to answer such a response. So, she just nervously answered "ok.."

Star then fired up her wand as always, but something was off about the way Star casted the spell. Her mind was elsewhere, thinking of all the incredible fun things her and Sabrina could do. When her mind was off track, random things spawned from her wand. And she was going to cast it on herself. So, anything remotely close to the word "clean" in Star's mind would potentially hit her.

Star merely closed her eyes though and fired a bright pink beam at herself. Once the beam hit Star, pink dust clouds engulfed the room. Sabrina quickly waved the pink air away to reveal to her somewhat surprise, Star didn't cast a cleaning spell. She casted an age spell, turning herself into what looked like an 8 month old baby.

Star's clothes had changed. Now, she wore a lavender baby dress with white frills around her neck hole and arm holes. The bottom of the dress had a light lavender design with a dark purple line slightly above it. On the white neck frills, there was a pink diamond gem. Her leg socks and shoes were completely gone, leaving her little baby legs naked. The only thing that could be seen below Star's lavender baby dress was a white round diaper, which was easily visible. Star's pink hearts on her cheeks were now bulgy and a lot of her hair receded. She still had her majestic blonde hair, it just was far shorter. She also had two clear blonde loops situated like piggy tails.

Star's body was now chubby. Her arms and legs were short. Her body had functionally regressed to that of an infant. Star had no teeth left. She still knew how to talk and magic would help her, but her pronunciation could be effected.

Star's wand had also adjusted to Star's new age. Her wand now also functioned as a baby rattle. It looked fairly the same, except it's handle was shorter. the end was more of a ball, and the whole instrument sounded like a rattle if it was shaken.

All Sabrina could think to do was scream. Shortly after the smoke cleared, Sabrina raised her voice, screeching in fear. Sabrina hadn't yet discovered what happened, but the screams only triggered Star's instinctual baby reaction. Wittle Star cried. Star's cries quickly overwhelmed Sabrina's, which knocked Sabrina out of her fear. Left in front of her was her magical friend reduced to infancy. Sabrina didn't know what to do, but this wasn't the time to panic. She had to do something to get the baby calm again. So, Sabrina did the instinctual thing, picking Star up, holding the baby tightly in her bosom, rocking her back and forth, and saying "everything will be okay."

Luckily for Sabrina, babies from Star's dimension required the same treatment and Star quickly calmed down. In an adorable perky voice, Star then asked "Wha gowin' on? Me know siwwy, ebewywing wiw be o-kay. Hehe, wha ya scweamin abowt siwwy?"

Sabrina was amazed that Star didn't notice. She took a deep breath and then quickly told Star "you turned into a baby! that wasn't a cleaning spell, that was a baby spell! What are we gonna do now?!"

Star gave a causal "Wha? no.." not even noticing her voice yet. So, Sabrina walked over to a mirror with the baby in her arms, showing Star the new look.

Star gazed at her own reflection, dumb stricken. The silence eventually passed though, with another unexpected reaction. Star lit up with not worry, but glee. She was exhilarated and cheerful all of sudden.

Sabrina quickly interjected. "Star Butterfly, is everything alright?"

Star gave one of her characteristic laughs "Ob corwse, siwwy? Why you ask? Me happy!!"

Sabrina just gave a surprised "really...?" to that response.

Star giggled some more. "Ob corwse! Me wook adorwable, me stiw can speak, an me ge ta do aw-wal sorts of fun stuff."

"Bu-but what about all the fun stuff as a teenager?"

"Wha abowt it?"

"You can't do those things as a baby!"

"Why not?"

"Because it's too sophisticated for babies."

Star smirked "Me tinks oda-wise. Anee woo, dis shud-dent inta feer wit aw get togeta, wight?"

Sabrina wanted to say "no," but she didn't have the nerves to say so to a baby or a popular friend at school for that matter. Instead, all Sabrina said was "it just might not be a get together anymore and more like a babysitting."

Star giggled. "Dat funny Sabwina!! Now, wet's go owt an pway!"

Sabrina thought to herself "this is going to be a long weekend."

choices: Sabrina isn't that messy of an eater
155332222222222222222222222222211121121.content:
After Sabrina was finished getting dressed, she asked Star what she wanted to do.

Star took out her pacifier to cheerfully say "Me wanna go owtside?"

"Ahh, you want to go to the park?"

"Oooooo.. dat sound fun! Wha at da pawk?"

"Slides, swings, teeter totters, things like that."

"Me no kno anee ah dose tings. DIS GONNA BE BWAST!!"

Sabrina giggled and pulled out the adorable pink stroller Star made. Star saw the stroller and immediately started bouncing up and down on her cushioned butt. "Wet me in! Wet me in! Me neba been in wona dose tings!"

"Haha, first we need to get back downstairs Star."

Star gave an unenthusiastic "Kay..." to which Sabrina scooped the baby princess up and cradled her down stairs, with the stroller behind her.

Once downstairs, Sabrina got the two situated. Once Star was in the stroller, she started bouncing up and down again on her cushion-y butt. Sabrina just smiled and made sure that she still had diapers, lotions, and any other baby necessities on hand. This was actually turning out to be a lot of fun. She was showing this stuff to Star for the first time and Star had so much babylike wonder to it all. It brought a smile to Sabrina's face, reminding her of simpler times.

Sabrina then pushed them out, locking the door behind her and making remarks to occupy Star's baby wonder.

Everything was going fine until two females approached Star and Sabrina along the way to the park. These two females spotted baby Star and just couldn't help themselves. They had to go coo the little one.

Star enjoyed the company, but still wasn't quite aware of correct social behavior. (which happened to fit the fact that she was a baby)

The females approached as so "Awwwww, what an adorable baby you have here. She's just precious."

Star spoke up with an adorable response "Me nah pwecious, Me Star"

One of the females said "Oh, why yes, you are a Star."

Sabrina chuckled "She means that her name is Star."

The two were surprised, but still intrigued and asked. "Where's this adorable one headed?"

"We're going to the park. It'll be Star's first time there."

The visitors simply "awwed" at that and insisted they come along. Sabrina and Star didn't see why not, and so the two followed along, adoring Star for the little while before they got to the park.

Once at the park, Sabrina showed Star all the options. The one that first lit Star's fancy was the sandbox. The two females just couldn't contain their d'awws.

At one point, one of them said "ya know, Star, this is a great part of your life. I miss my babyhood. Don't you Bridgette?"

The other female responded "You bet Emily!" and then asked Star who just plopped her diapered butt on the sand "would you mind if we played with you?"

Star was ecstatic, "You hear dat Sabwina! Dey wanna pway mit! Wet's pway pway." Before anyone could respond, Star naturally decided to shoot these two women with her wand rattle, turning both of them into 8 month babies as well.

Sabrina immediately was alarmed after seeing the pink smoke again and waved it away to reveal the two other adults as the same age as Star. Bridgette, the black haired pale skin lady now wore a green baby dress similar to that of Star's, just without any gems. Her hair was shorter, but just hung down. A similar white round diaper was easily visible. Bridgette's previous green blouse was essentially the dress while her entire bottom half was the diaper. Her purse had been turned into a green baby bag with various baby necessities inside.

Meanwhile, her friend, Emily, the brown haired Caucasian lady now wore a blue baby dress similar to that of Bridgette's. Her hair was also shorter and hung down. She now wore a white round diaper over her groin, one that was easily visible. Emily's blue blouse was replaced with the dress and everything else with the diaper. Her purse was now a blue baby bag with her own baby necessities.

Both former adults looked at each other and then up at Sabrina and then wailed. Sabrina did her best to calm them, picking them both up and rocking them back and forth. (which seemed to work.) They were quickly calmed and asked the question "Wha happened?!"

Star actually responded to that one. "Wew, you two sed ya miss babyhood an dat you wan-ted ta pway wit me. Me jus assumed, ya wan-ted ta be babies again. So, me turn you two inta babies."

The two new babies were flabbergasted and then Sabrina told them "Sorry about this. Star has magic abilities and she doesn't mean these kind of things."

These two females didn't take this well, so Sabrina pacifiered them until they would behave. Then Sabrina took care of the now three babies. Hours then passed with Star playing in the park with other babies, many of which used to be adults. Bridgette and Emily were merely the first two to be affected.

After a while, these adults and their belongings would be turned back. Surprisingly, many weren't upset. Bridgette and Emily even asked if they could play with Star again sometime. Somehow, through a string of luck, Star made tons of friends who wanted to be babies with her. Some of those friends were even with Star's fellow classmates.

Sabrina was amazed at the positivity of these folks. She was also amazed that her late morning and early none was spent caring for so many babies.

Around 2 o'clock, Sabrina took Star back to her home. When they got there, Star told Sabrina "Dat was so much fun!! Tank you for agweeing to pway wit me today Sabwina. Dis totally makes up for Marco leaving."

Sabrina was extremely exhausted, but still put up an adult mask best she could. "Aww, it's no problem Star. I like caring for you anyway."

"Weawy?! Dat's gwate. You can be me official babysitta den." Those words were particularly terrifying to Sabrina, but she hid her emotions. Sabrina just did all that was expected of her, cradling the little baby yet again and saying "somebody needs to get some food in they're tummy."

choices: Amy gets baby supplies and sets up Sonic's new, hopefully temporary, life
1553322222222222222222222222222221111211.content:
It was pretty calm on the island. Just Hours earlier, Eggman had just failed again. This meant he probably wouldn't be around for another 3 to 4 days.

Amy marched into Tails' workshop with a disheveled look, from Eggman's robots blowing up in her face. "TAILS!"

Tails just sighed. "Yes Amy..."

"Don't you 'Yes Amy' me! Can you please work on that Face Youthener I asked you about a couple days ago?!"

"Face Youthener..." Tails then pondered for a second and then memory struck him. "Oh yea! I said I would help out with-" Tails' expression changed to embarrassment. "Right... I'll get on that. I'm sorry I didn't finish it. It's just, I was working on my-"

Amy just facepalmed. "It's okay... just call me when you're done. I'll be at my house, hiding my face away."

Tails took a deep breath of relief. "Augh.. that was close. K.. Face Youthener.. Face Youthener... Where did I put that?" He then spotted it out of the corner of his eyes. "Ahh, there you are." After examining it he then said "Yeeesh, I really didn't spend any time on you, did I? Eh, this should be easy."

Tails then spent the next 2-3 hours in his lab, putting on the finishing touches. "Here we go! And with that, this should be done!"

Sonic overheared Tails talking to himself, which was the usual. He nonchalantly walked in. "I see you're talking to yourself still."

Tails ignored the obvious joke and just responded "Hey Sonic! I just finished the Face Youthener for Amy!"

"The what?"

Tails sighed. "The Face Youtheren. In short it makes someone look younger."

"Ahhh, thanks for the english version buddy. So, that's for Amy?"

"Yea, she's been insisting what with Eggman robots hurting her look apparently."

"Haha, sounds about right. Well, if that thing works alright, let me give it a try. Let's see how overrated fashion can be."

"Um.. alright, well, if I were you, I would put it at the lowest setting. You're not Amy after all, you don't want to look like you had a makeover did you?"

"Heh, I guess you're right. Well, let her rip!"

Tails then pressed the button, aiming the machine at Sonic on the normal setting. In the blink of an eye, a light blue ray hit Sonic, engulfing the room in smoke.

At the time smoke was coming out of the window, Amy conveniently stopped by. "Tails!" *cough* "is my Face Youthener done?!" *cough*

Tails gave a coughing response. *Cough* "It should be!" *Cough* "I just used it on Sonic!"

The smoke finally started to clear up some. Amy's reply was somewhat concerned "Then what's with this" *cough* "Smoo-"

Amy cut herself off after seeing a little baby Sonic. Her head quickly processed who was crawling before her. "ta-Ta-TAILS WHAT DID YOU DO?!"

Tails of course saw Sonic right around the same time he heard Amy yell at him. Tails just remained speechless.

Meanwhile, baby Sonic soon started to cry, because of Amy's yelling. With Tails dumbfounded and Sonic crying as a baby, Amy took a deep breath. “What you think has happened, has not happened! What you think has happened-“

The crying distracted her from her statement and she finished it with a “has happened… IT HAPPENED!”

She did the best she could in this panicked state, picking up baby Sonic and trying to calm him. “It’s okay Sonic.. It’s okay… no need to-to… CRY!” Amy couldn’t help it. She started crying with Sonic.

Through an odd twist of roles, Sonic actually calmed down after that, with a deadpanned expression at Amy.

Amy could tell what Sonic was trying to tell her, but was surprised by his calmness. She slowly regained her composure though, holding baby Sonic in her arms.

From Sonic’s expression, she gave the concerned question “Sonic... are you alright?”

Sonic just continued his deadpanned look and nodded his head horizontally.

Amy gave a sigh of relief “For a second there, I thought you would say otherwise.”

Sonic didn’t change his expression.

“Don’t give me that look. This isn’t my fault?”

Sonic just pointed to the supposed Face Youthener. Amy just defensively asked “What?! Is it so wrong to want to look pretty once and a while?!”

Sonic didn’t change his expression, which concerned Amy a bit. “Okay.. okay… fine, this is a bit of my fault. It’s also Tails’ fault too.” She then turned to Tails, “Tails! Did you hear that Tails?!”

Amy’s yelling got Tails out of his shock. He shook his head, getting out of his trance. “Ugh, I just had the craziest dream that I-“ He cut himself off after seeing Sonic
“It wasn’t a dream Tails.”

“Well, we’ve officially hit crazyville.”

Amy raised her voice. “Tails! This is no laughing matter Tails!”

He sighed. “You’re right… look, I’m gonna get on this. You just have to take ca-“

Tails passed out after that. His lack of sleep was clearly showing.

Amy just said to herself, with Sonic there obviously. “Greeat! Just great! Now what do we do?”

Sonic just pointed to the device. “Ooo.. good idea Sonic, I should take out the batteries and take the device so no one else gets hurt.”

Sonic sighed as Amy did as she said and dragged Tails to his one the ground sleeping bag.

Amy then playfully booped Sonic’s nose. “For the time being though, we need to get you situated.”

Sonic became a little tear-y eyed at this mention. Amy just played along though. “Awww, there there, need to fear” She then carried him with his head on her shoulder. In a timid voice she said “Don’t worry Sonic, we’ll fix this…”
1553322222222222222222222222222221111211.title: Sonic Babying Coincidentally from Amy's Request

choices: Amy hears Screams from the Town
1553322222222222222222222222222221111211.content:
"First things first, you'll need a stroller and some diapers" Amy calmly pointed out.

Sonic hid his face in Amy's fur upon that request. Amy smiled gently in response. Even if this was odd, Sonic was acting the same and she had a golden opportunity to care for him.

Shortly after Amy's statement, the two arrived in down. Moments into their journey, the town folk looked at her and the baby with bewilderment. Amy simply ignored these expressions and approached Lady Walrus, who was at "Meh Burger."

In an overly perky attitude, Amy asked "Hey! Lady Walrus, you're just the person I was looking for. Do you, by any chance, know where someone could get baby supplies?"

Lady Walrus seemed over-enthused by this "Why of course! I see you and Sonic finally had-"

Amy's face lit up bright red with embarrassment, cutting off Lady Walrus' statement. "No, That's na-not it."

"Then who is the little darling in your-" Lady Walrus cut herself off. "Is that..?"

Amy gave a depressed nod.

Lady Walrus gasped, holding her right hand over her mouth. Shortly after, she regained her composure. "Come with me. I'll guide you to the store. You especially must be feeling horrible."

Amy shushed Lady Walrus at that response, whispering "he is still conscious."

Lady Walrus had a simple response "Oh my. Good catch." Fortunately, Sonic didn't hear a peep of that. He actually had fallen asleep in Amy's arms. Lady Walrus shortly noticed this after saying her last statement. "Awww, look what we have here."

"Huh" Amy responded "What are you-?" She cut herself off upon seeing Sonic fast asleep. Even though this whole ordeal was an unpleasant experience for her, Amy couldn't help but "awwww" wildly at this. Oddly enough, this sorta turned her on. It's hard to blame her. Here was her crush, someone who she had plenty of affection for, curled up in her arms as a helpless baby. In some ways, whether she'd like to admit it, this appeased one of her fantasies.

Lady Walrus smiled with a chuckle upon noticing this. After realizing what Lady Walrus noticed, Amy's cheeks turned bright pink, much like her fur.

Amy was the next one to speak. "Soo.. what about that store?" Lady Walrus "Oh right, this way."

The two of them walked to the store in silence. Lady Walrus had her baby in a stroller, looking straight forward. Meanwhile, Amy was cradling her love interest.

This silence was cut off by the store. Once it was in sight, Amy thanked Lady Walrus immensely and rushed into the store, making sure not to wake Sonic.

At the entrance of the store, an employee spotted Amy. This employee, a stereotypical cream colored stork, asked Amy “Hi dear, does someone’s little guy need a diaper?”

Normally, Amy would take this statement to be an odd one, but she had no time to judge and merely responded “Yes. Are there any changing stations that I can quickly use?”

The employee smiled “Of course darling. We here at Pamper Paradise understand that new moms need some leeway. The changing stations are right in the back. Have fun shopping.”

Amy again blushed “Thank you. This new mom stupidly forgot to pick up diapers.” Amy then rushed to the back, going into one of the changing stalls.

She took a deep breath, talking to herself “Alright, Amy, you can do this. You’ve cared for young ones before. This is no different.” She then gently placed the naked Sonic on a soft cushy changing table.

After seeing Sonic again though, she struggled to keep her composure. She was past concern at this point, instead trying to hold back arousal. Ever sense she saw Sonic asleep, she couldn’t help but remember one of her fantasies that went much like this.

Taking a deep breath, Amy started the diaper changing, all the while keeping up an aroused smile. She gently held Sonic’s legs, raising up his behind and sprinkling baby powder all over. “Hehe, what a cute butt you have Sonic.” Then Amy slide a cozy white diaper underneath Sonic and strapped it in place. The changing was complete, leaving Sonic ever more arousing to poor Amy.

She held him in her arms over her shoulder once again and began buying more than enough baby items. Seriously, Amy was anything but sane at this point. She bought things that were likely unneeded, such as water diapers and bed time stories. She even purchased a build-it-crib set. All of these things were colored light blue. (Not like the store had much options anyway. After all, all the baby boy supplies were that color.) By the time Amy left, she had a baby carrier on her back, a baby bag around her right shoulder, and a wheeled cart with bigger baby items such as diaper packages, a high chair, and the build-it crib. Of course, Amy also had a stroller with Sonic as well as toys, lotions, and diapers,

Fortunately, the store was quite close to her home and on the outskirts of town. So, she was able to avoid another crowd confrontation.

Wasting no time at all, she was home in a mere 7 minutes. Without a second to spare, she got to work, setting up several items in the living room. First, she assembled the baby gate, putting several baby toys inside it. Fortunately for Sonic, she put this baby gate close to the TV, by moving one of the couches. That said, this was Amy after all. Under her supervision, there was no way this baby would watch anything mildly “inappropriate.” Then Amy set up the new mini fridge with several baby bottles filled with formula and baby food. Near the fridge, around the kitchen island, she put Sonic’s high chair with a bib in the seat. The last finishing touch in the main hut was to put Sonic’s stroller near the baby gate, putting Sonic in the baby carrier and walking the two of them out to her second hut.

One of the two docks to her house, led to this second hut, which was slightly smaller where her room was. Here, she put together Sonic’s crib as well as some the diaper packages, as well as some toys and baby lotions.

All was done and Amy’s house didn’t look half bad with the new items. Things were more a mixture of blue and pink, but it all matched.

Now what?
1553322222222222222222222222222221111211.title: Caring a Love Interest as If They're Your Baby

choices: Sonic and Amy Have a Cheerful Uninterrupted Mommy-Baby Experience
Sonic and Amy are Interrupted by Wails of Terror from The Town
1553322222222222222222222222222221111211.content:
Shortly after the last pillow was set in Sonic’s new crib, Amy was gently tucking him into bed. Out of left field though, little Sonic woke up.

Sonic slowly woke up, stretching his little arms and yawning. Amy gushed uncontrollably at this, rocking the baby boy in her arms. “How was your wittle nappy Sonic?”
Before opening his eyes, Sonic responded in his new high pitched voice without remembering the changes that occurred prior. “Nuh ten Mu-“

Sonic quickly cut himself off after noticing his voice, opening his eyes in nervous-ness. “Wha is gowi-“ Sonic scowled after seeing Amy. “Me dweam wa ent a dweam wa et?”

Amy anxiously responded, trying to pull off a happy demeanor. “Na-nope silly. But, while you were sleeping I got you all situated at my place. We’ll have tones of fu-“

“Sit-u.. Sit-u…” Sonic struggled to pronounce the word. In a deadpanned voice, Sonic stated “Na, yo-wa di-dent.” Then Sonic looked down at his diapered bottom. “Yo-wa di.”

Amy tried to underplay it. “Well, yes.. don’t be mad, it’s not that it’s that bad…” However, Sonic’s continued deadpanned expression just made her snap into a defensive spat “Don’t give me that look. What was I supposed to do? I wasn’t going to let you potentially have an accident? What kind of parent would do that?!”

Sonic was broiling with rage. “Yo-wa nah me mommy! Ya cud-a woke Ta-Ta-Tal-sa! Me nah gonna hab mes! Amy, yo-wa mes me u-“

Amy had it. She was done being lectured by her love. For once in her life, she had found arousal from him and she wasn’t going to be guilt tripped for it. “You listen here Sonic. You are a baby. That’s what I am dealing with. Do NOT, I repeat, DO NOT give me a hard time for trying to help you in your time of need. Whether you like it or not, I am your temporary mommy. Got that?!”

Upon being called a “baby” in an authoritative tone, Sonic became tear-y eyed. For the remainder of Amy’s rant, Sonic’s emotions gradually overtook him. After Amy finished talking, Sonic could only think to do one thing. He cried.

“WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!”

Amy immediately became tear-y eyed herself after realizing she made Sonic cry. She couldn’t believe what she did and she did everything in her power to stop his woes. “There there Sonic. Amy is here. I’m here.”

None of these reassurances worked, so Amy switched to rocking him back and forth. Unfortunately that didn’t work either. Neither did lullabies. Nothing seemed to work. After five or so minutes of unsuccessful attempts, Amy broke out into loud sobs followed by “I’M SORRY!”

This snapped Sonic out of his wail, but Amy kept on going. “I’m sorry… I-I should’ve woken up tails. I-I didn’t because…” Amy wiped away her tears. “Because I love you. I don’t mean as a mommy, I mean as a friend.. as a lover… I didn’t take you to Tails, because somewhere deep down I wanted to take care of you.” Amy sighed after her confession. “Come on Sonic, I’ll take you to Tails. Please forgive me if you can.”

Sonic sighed in response. “Way-ta. Ca-ma dow-na Amy. Me nah angwy a-ne maw. Me ge et. Me took me anga on yo-wa. Me jus sca-da. We no nee ta go ta Tal-sa wight no-wa.”

Amy looked surprised. “Sonic, are you sure?”

Sonic tried to play it off cool. (Even as a baby, he still had to keep up an image.) “Ya. Me tink Tal-sa gonna nee he sweep if he gonna hewp me. He lack ob sweep pwob-o-we ca dis mess a-nee ways.”

Amy chuckled at that. “Haha, you’re probably right.” Seconds passed then where the two just stared at each other with smiles. Amy finally was the one to break the silence. “Thank you Sonic. You always know how to cheer me up.” Amy showed her affection further by kissing Sonic’s forehead. “So, what do you want to do for the time being Sonic?”

Sonic blushed adorably at Amy’s kiss. In a cute manner, Sonic looked away from Amy and said “Me a wita hung-we. Cu-cud yo-wa fee me?”

Amy’s cheeks turned bright red. It all reality, it was a miracle that Amy’s nose didn’t bleed. Amy gave a very short response. “Okay Sonic.” This day was developing in ways she couldn’t imagine. It’s like she wasn’t in reality all of a sudden. She somewhat zoned out afterwards. Sonic snapped her out of it though.

“Um.. Amy…”

“Y-yes Sonic.”

Sonic looked away and quietly asked. “Cu-cu me aw-so ca-ca-caw yo-wa mommy insted?”

Amy’s nose burst with blood upon that request. Reflexively, she wiped it off with her right arm. Of course, she didn’t want Sonic to see that. Fortunately for her, he didn’t.

Amy couldn’t help but nervously ask “Yes, but if you don’t mind me asking, why?”

Sonic grumbled “Cus it make me fee betta.. Kay…”

Amy could tell that Sonic was uncomfortable with the question, so she gave a light hearted response “No problem Sonic, as long as you don’t mind me calling you things like ‘sweetums’ or ‘snookums.’ That way, we’re even.”

Sonic giggled. “Why yo-wa wanna caw me dat?”

In response, Amy placed the little one on her bed and proceeded to tickle him uncontrollably “Because.. you’re just so SWEET! Come here little guy!!”

Sonic laughed away and Amy giggled with him. There they were, two friends now laughing uncontrollably on Amy’s bed. This was the first of many priceless moments, they’d have.

After minutes of laughter, the two slowly calmed down, gazing into each other’s eyes. The piercing stares they gave each other were much like that of an actual mother and her child. Little did they know, their friendship was going in a radically different direction.

These stares were finally interrupted roughly 10 minutes later with Sonic’s grumbling tummy.

“Awwww, does my little sweetums want his milky?”

Sonic giggled in response, nodding up and down. “Yo-wa kno it mommy!”

Amy giggled back. This was an odd sort of chemistry they were having. They were being sincere with one another. However, they also had a slight tinge of sarcasm to words like “sweetums” and “mommy,” as if the two of them were roleplaying.

The two of them slowly got out their giggles as Amy carried Sonic to the kitchen.

What now?
1553322222222222222222222222222221111211.title: Once Friends, But Now More Like Mommy and Baby

¨Sowwy...¨He squeaks.

The woman sighs.

1553322222222222222222222222222222223222.content:
As Jinora's spirit appeared to aid Korra in her battle against the giant Unavaatu, the two felt a strong surge of spiritual energy pass between them. With the battle over, both of their spirits returned to their body.

Healing hut:
As Asami, Katara, Tonraq and Senna watched over Jinora's body, they were shocked. The moment her spirit re-entered her body, the water Jinora was in began to glow with a blinding light. When the light dissipated, they were shocked to see that, where the once eleven year old girl laid, now rested a young eighteen year old women, wearing nothing more than a ripped airbender's robe, and with much longer hair.

As Jinora opened her eyes, she seemed to to not notice the change yet and simply hugging her grandmother. Only then did she notice her longer hair and look down and her now developed body. "Wh..what happened?, Jinora said, beginning to panic.

"Calm down sweet heart", Katara said, trying to calm her down. "What happened?"

"I...I'm not sure....there was this surge of power....I don't know what else it could be.", Jinora said.

"What about Korra and the others?", Asami asked, wondering if Korra would be older as well.

"Their fine, Korra saved the world.", Jinora said, begining to calm down.

Spirit world:
When Korra returned to her body and exited the Tree Of Time, she seemed fine, but once she and Raava flew up, separating the spirit portals, and merging the two together again, she descended back towards the ground, to her friends shock, the person who stood there, was not the 18 year old woman they had known for the past year, the person who now stood there was still her, but now no older than eleven years old, with short hair that reached only her chin, and now baggy clothes.

"Its over.", Korra said in a higher pitch voice, not noticing her change yet. Seeing the look of shock on her friends face, and the fact that they seemed larger, she looked down at her now small body. "WHAT THE...What happened to me?", Korra screamed.

next

choices: By one of her old College buddies (New made up character)
1553322222222222222222222222222222223222.content:
On a cloudy spring Thursday afternoon for Foster’s Home for Imaginary Friend. Business was chugging away gradually for the new year as all years prior had. Still, for as slow as things were Mr. Herriman, found over a dozen chores for Frankie to do that day all of which entailed the usual daily maintenance.

Fortunately for the red headed twenty something, luck was so far on her side today. Herriman was unable to micromanage her performance due to monthly forms and the most routy imaginary friend, Bloo, was distracted with a new video game. It hadn’t even hit 3 o’clock yet and most of the house was clean as whistle.

That said as Frankie came by the main entrance area, Mr. Herriman was hopping to her in his calm prestigious manner. “Ah Ms. Francis, there you. I was just about to look for you.”

Frankie sighed, bracing for impact. “What is it now?”

“Nothing much, it would appear we’ll be having another imaginary friend dropped off in about an hour.”

“Another one?” Frankie’s eye brows rose in sad surprise.

Mr. Herriman nodded. “Yes, unfortunately it seems this one was a real trouble maker.”

“How bad are we talking?”

The rabbit man stroked his chin for a moment. “It is hard to say. Best to prepare for the worst though considering what they’ve done.”

Frankie broke a sweat. “What all did they do?”

“They turned their owners into babies on multiple occasions.”

“Wait… What?!”

“No need to yell Ms. Francis, it’s uncivilized.”

Frankie took a deep breath. “I’m sorry, it’s just that sounds terrible. What business did a kid have imagining that up anyways?”

“Well, it seems they were inspired by a cartoon by the name of Lilo and Stitch.”

Frankie vaguely knew of that show, but couldn’t imagine what this friend looked like.

“I recommend you do some research on this before they arrive.”
Frankie paused stunned. “Wait.. do you mean, watch the cartoon?”

“Why yes? Is there something wrong with that?”

Frankie threw her fists into the air. “Nice!”

“May I help you?” Mr. Herriman said annoyed.

“No, no, no. It’s just I rarely get to do that on the job is all.”

Her rabbit boss sighed, hopping away. “Do not make me regret this assignment Ms. Francis.”

Before Mr. Herriman could object, Frankie sprinted upstairs to her room and hopped onto the internet. She grabbed an orange soda from her mini fridge and looked online for the episode.

“Let’s see.. Lilo and Stitch baby-”

The google search bar quickly auto inserted “fier” to the end of her search and before Frankie knew it, she had the episode. She looked it up on youtube and sat back and relaxed.

While there were a couple plot points she was unfamiliar with, she was able to fill in the blanks pretty easily. She gasped though seeing what this imaginary friend was capable of doing. With just a shake of its rattle tail, it could regress someone down to babydom, mind, body, and all.

“Ouch, this is gonna be ‘fun’” Frankie said deadpanned to herself as she continued watching.

Knowing that Disney made this cartoon, it had to have an antidote here. It didn’t come until the very end, but she got the recipe remedy.

Two teaspoons of applesauce
One cup of milk
Three mashed bananas
And A dollop of 100% Kona coffee

These were all that was needed for the victim to return to their correct age. Frankie wrote this down neatly, before turning off her computer and walking to Mr. Herriman’s office.

As she reached the main entrance area though, the doorbell rang. They were ahead of schedule but only by a couple minutes. She folded the paper, placing it in her pocket and opened the door.

“Hello, welcome to Foster’s Home For-”

“Ya ya, for Imaginary Friends, I already spoke with your boss on the phone I don’t need a run down.”

Frankie stumbled over her words. “R-right. Well, right this way ma’am.”

The lady at the door had a business suit on with a light blue blouse underneath and long brunette hair. Her entire body language made it loud and clear she didn’t want to be here. Before Frankie could examine them further, the little one spoke up.

“Mo-mommy. Do we have to give her away?” The little four year old girl with a teddy asked. “Sh-she’ll be good I promise.”

The lady bent down to her daughter. “Honey, we’ve been over this. Mommy doesn’t want to be turned into a baby again. This is the best solution for both of us.”

A look of pity crossed over Frankie’s face before she asked. “Wait, where is the-”

The lady sighed. “The imaginary friend, right here darling. I had it dehumidified, turning it back into this ball.”

The lady handed it to Frankie, who looked surprised. “Tha-thank you. I’ll take that.”

“Mommy.. Can I hold her before we say goodbye.”

The ma’am nodded, before Frankie sympathetically said to the little one. “Don’t worry, she’ll have a good home here.”

The little girl brushed her tears away, before nodding. “Thanks.”

Frankie then led the two into Mr. Herriman’s office and the paperwork was quickly filed away. The two friends said their goodbyes before leaving.

Mr. Herriman cut to business afterwards. “Ms. Francis, may I have the imaginary friend. I’ll be putting it over here for safe keeping.”

“O-okay, but be gentle with it. That kid really misses her friend.”

“Yes, yes, I know. Now let’s carry on with the rest of our day.”

Frankie sighed, doing as instructed. She felt bad, but she wasn’t gonna argue over this. Mr. Herriman had a point keeping this imaginary friend away from others.

Not long thereafter, Mac came to see blue and the day carried on as per usual. Little did they know though that the next day would be a disaster at least for one of them.

How will poor Frankie be cared for though tomorrow when the incident comes? That's the million dollar question.
